div.p: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

First i'm going to buy a lot of present for my girlfriend. Maybe twice a week.Then, I would like also pay all tons of my favorite mangas. It's "one piece". But with the most part of my money, I thinf I'll take a beautiful house and a big car like porshe or ferrarri for the end of my studies. Finally I'm going to keep the rest of my money in my bank to buy my food for exemple.
